articles.description: Google launched a new quality section on its Android developer site and updated the Core App Quality checklist.  These moves continue Google’s push for better app quality, such as improved privacy and battery life and increased gesture navigation. Google prom…
articles.content: Google has launched a new quality section on its Android developer site and updated the Core App Quality checklist. These moves continue Google’s push for better app quality, such as improved privacy… [+2858 chars]
